subjectCategories: LAW, POLITICAL SCIENCE AND SPACE POLICY
abstract: The recommendations of the Legal Subcommittee of the United Nations committee for the Peaceful Uses of Space concerning satellite remote sensing are considered. Detailed studies of the Scientific and Technical Subcommittee of this committee are discussed with emphasis on three draft proposals submitted to it on remote sensing by (1) France and the USSR, (2) Latin American countries, and (3) the United States.
title: The United Nations contribution towards an international agreement on remote sensing

meetings.name: Legal implications of remote sensing from outer space
